author: arunhep
body:
backport of  #48933 

#### PR description:

This PR is intended to change the name of Global Tags which are being used for 2016, 2017, 2018, 2022 and 2023 realistic pp MC workflows.
This is just renaming to make the GTs coherent with 15_0_X release which will be used for Mini -> Mini MC campaign. 

This renaming was requested by PPD coordinators in this gitlab issue : https://gitlab.cern.ch/cms-ppd/dataset-management/simulation-production/-/issues/47#note_10086478

Here are the Diff links with the present GTs:

**2016 pre-VFP**

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun2_asymptotic_preVFP_v1/131X_mcRun2_asymptotic_preVFP_v3

**2016, after VFP change**
 
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1/131X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v3

**2017 MC**

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mc2017_realistic_v1/131X_mc2017_realistic_v3

**2018 MC** 
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mc2018_realistic_v1/131X_upgrade2018_realistic_v3

**2022 MC**

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v1/140X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v12


 **2022 post-EE+ leak**

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v1/140X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v3

**2023**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v1/140X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v9

 **PostBPix issue 2023**

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/150X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_postBPix_v1/140X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_postBPix_v3
title: [15_0_X] [Backport] Renaming the GTs for Mini to Mini MC Campaigns (Run2+Run3)
